body_text:
(This issue is intended for Andy to work on as his first bug, do not take this!)
The survey ID on show-heartbeat recipes is a useful piece of information that S&I wants to be able to see on the index listing page. However, since it only applies to show-heartbeat recipes, we probably should come up with a more generic solution for showing details about a recipe based on the action.
Here's a mockup I came up with for one possibility of how to display this:

This isn't exactly how it should look; we should probably remove the bullets on the list. But it's a starting point.
If possible, we should also make the survey ID searchable in the search box, and more generically, any value in the details column.
